actions.text: Amendment SA 455 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 455 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Brown. (consideration: CR S2292-2296; text: CR S2292) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to establish a national network for manufacturing innovation that leverages private and public sector investments for proven United States based manufacturing industries.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 455 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 455 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Brown.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to establish a national network for manufacturing innovation that leverages private and public sector investments for proven United States based manufacturing industries.
